original_title: Hank Danger and the League of Scientists
overview: Hank Danger returns to the screen for his third thrilling and hilarious adventure! This time, our intrepid hero Hank Danger is searching for a missing scientist! The trail of intrigue leads Hank Danger and company from the shadowy alleys of the city to the secret jungle lair of the Mastermind -- a nefarious villain who intends to take over the world with an army of hypnotized vampire replicants! Can Hank Danger stop him?
title: Hank Danger and the League of Scientists
